title: Prime Property on Main Road in Colombo 7
details:
Location! Location! Location! This property is 80+ perches, faces a main road in Colombo 7 and with it's wide main road frontage, the development options are nearly limitless. An adjoining property which ads a further 20 perches is also available should the buyer be interested in obtaining 100+ perches in Colombo's most coveted area. Priced at Rs. 22m per perch, this property value can only appreciate and is one to be considered for any type of Commercial or Residential development

-Adjoining property with a further 20+ perches is also available
